Sentencas: Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (NiO-SDC) ceramics with homogeneous pore distribution were prepared using polystyrene (PS) spheres as pore templates.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: NiO-SDC powders were synthesized by a glycine-nitrate method, ultrasonically mixed with PS spheres in ethanol, dried and then pressed into green pellets.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The pellets were sintered to yield porous NiO-SDC ceramics.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effects of the sintering temperature on the microstructure and mechanical strength of the ceramics were investigated.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: NiO-SDC ceramics sintered at 1200 and 1350 degrees C have interconnected pore structures and high compression strength.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: When single cells were fabricated using porous NiO-SDC ceramics as anode-supported layers, the peak power density of the cells at 600 degrees C was 333 and 353 mW.cm(-2) for ceramics sintered at 1200 and 1350 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results indicated that these porous ceramic materials are promising for anode substrates for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation of Porous NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 Ceramics for Anode-supported Low-temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
